Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to you, offering unparalleled benefits and features. I am offering it to you at a special price of $11,500, aiming to bring you the best value while maximizing my earnings. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget and preferences, so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
